title: Moderna Chairman & Co-Founder on COVID-19 Vaccine
itunes:title: Moderna Chairman & Co-Founder on COVID-19 Vaccine
description:
Noubar Afeyan, Moderna Chairman & Co-Founder, discusses his company's COVID-19 vaccine candidate, efficacy data and applying for FDA emergency use authorization.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
